data.name: Brick-Force: Black Knight DLC
data.detailed_description:
Why be the white knight if you can be his evil counterpart and spread fear among your adversaries? With the Black Knight Pack, you'll make sure that the last thing your enemies see is their biggest nightmare!

Wreak havoc with your mighty sword or attack from the shadows using your deadly crossbow - the choice is yours, but you'll look menacing either way.
To top it off, we provide you with 10 Elite Weapon Gems which will upgrade your weapons so that no one will be able to stop you!
data.about_the_game:
Why be the white knight if you can be his evil counterpart and spread fear among your adversaries? With the Black Knight Pack, you'll make sure that the last thing your enemies see is their biggest nightmare!

Wreak havoc with your mighty sword or attack from the shadows using your deadly crossbow - the choice is yours, but you'll look menacing either way.
To top it off, we provide you with 10 Elite Weapon Gems which will upgrade your weapons so that no one will be able to stop you!
data.short_description: Get rid of those old rags and slip into the shining armor of the Black Knight!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 (64 bit), Windows 7 (32 & 64 bit), Windows Vista (32 & 64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 64 3200+ / Intel Pentium 4 3200+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6100 or compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
  • Additional Notes: .net Framework 2.0 or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 (64 bit), Windows 7 (32 & 64 bit), Windows Vista (32 & 64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Athlon II X2 255 / Intel Pentium E 5500
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon ™ HD 3850 / NVIDIA GeForce 6800 GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
  • Additional Notes: .net Framework 2.0 or higher
